marginatus O. Müller, 1764: 23
(
Staphylinus
; [ Note: This name was described as new in

Staphylinus
separately by O. Müller, 1764, Ström, 1768, and Fabricius, 1775. Goeze,
1777, listed the three citations as referring to the same species. Fabricius, 1781, cited
his earlier listing and that of Ström as referring to the same species. Erichson, 1840

cited Fabricius as the author and the use by O. Müller and Ström as subsequent
citations. From Gravenhorst in 1802 until 1895 most authors cited Fabricius as the author

of
marginatus
; from Ganglbauer, 1895, to present most authors cited Ström as

; [ Note: Cited references to
marginatus
by Ström, 1768, and

marginatus

— Herman, 2001: 27 (

; valid name for species).
- DISTRIBUTION : Europe, Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, China.
